sentences.english: The hexagonal pot shown in this picture is painted with five-colors and was put to auction at Sotheby's in the Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 画上五色彩的六角盆图片在荷兰的苏富比拍卖。

sentences.english: Seen under a microscope , a fresh snowflake has a delicate six-pointed shape.
sentences.chinese: 在显微镜下观察，刚飘下的雪花呈精巧的六角形。

sentences.english: Grow on hexagons on the coast which are next to another palm tree.
sentences.chinese: 生长在靠近另一棵棕榈树的海岸六角领地上。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop a method for identification and analysis of the unknown toxic herbal medicinal powders: Dysosma pleiantha(Hance) Woodson.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究未知有毒中药粉末六角莲的鉴定与分析方法。

sentences.chinese: 河北六角网，电焊网，不锈钢丝网生产厂家。

sentences.english: E. Fix the toilet paper rack on the base with the M5 inner hexangular set screw.
sentences.chinese: 将厕纸架体用M5的内六角紧顶螺钉固定在底座上。

sentences.english: Hexagonal ice crystal are the basic form of the particles in cirrus.
sentences.chinese: 六角柱冰晶是卷云中粒子的基本形态。

sentences.english: He's got four thousand six hundred and ninety-one dollars and sixty-five cents.
sentences.chinese: 他挣到了四千六百九十一元六角五分。

sentences.english: Because thousand old at, so in June the hexangular station that can attach in the outside in.
sentences.chinese: 因为千老在，所以六月只能陪在外面的六角亭里。

sentences.english: Fix the cosmetic shelf on the base with the M5 inner hexangular set screw.
sentences.chinese: 将化妆台用M5的内六角紧顶螺钉固定在底座上。

sentences.english: France is known by Frenchmen as "the Hexagon" because of its shape.
sentences.chinese: 由于其版图形状，法国人称法国是六角形。

sentences.english: The metal wire diameter is different according to the size of the hexagon.
sentences.chinese: 使用的金属线径是根据六角形的大小而不同。

sentences.english: It is formed into long coils or entanglements called concertina wire.
sentences.chinese: 通常会被制成更长的盘或者是拧成所谓的“六角网”。

sentences.english: But the most notable difference is that the hexagonal outline around the icons is now gone.
sentences.chinese: 但是，最显著的区别是，六角形的图标现在不见了。

definition: the four corners (of a rectangle)/the eaves that the four corners of a building
